titleStmt.title: Preaching vvithout ordination or, A treatise proving the lawfulnesse of all persons, of what degree, ranke, or trade soever, being inabled with sufficient guifts and qualifications from God by his spirit, to preach and set forth the Gospel, though no minister nor any other officer in the church of God. By Edmond Chillinden.
titleStmt.author: Chillenden, Edmund, fl. 1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: for George Whittington, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Blew Anchor in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Blew Anchor in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange
